sentences.en: A frame synchronizer with recognizer and discriminator is described, which consists mainlyof a type 8951 singlechip computer, a type 8254 programmable counter and a GAL chip.
sentences.cn: 在激光水下通信的节头内插入捕获序列，用8951，8254，GAL等芯片构成识别判决式帧同步器。

sentences.en: Distortion of automobile synchronizer gear sleeves will take place during the course of carburization and quenching.
sentences.cn: 汽车同步器齿套在渗碳淬火后,发生变形.

sentences.en: I created a background synchronizer that used RestKit as it seemed to have everything I needed.
sentences.cn: 我创建了一个背景同步，用restkit好像有我需要的一切。

sentences.en: Metal forming: INA develops new manufacturing method for synchronizer sleeves ( used in Ford transmissions ).
sentences.cn: 金属成型: 冰核开发新的制造方法,同步套 ( 用于福特汽车变速器 ).

sentences.en: Precision forging is an important manufacturing procedure of steel synchronizer gear ring forming.
sentences.cn: 精锻是钢制同步器齿环制造过程中重要的成型工艺.

sentences.en: Reverse synchronizer and fransfer let the shift reverse with no shock and realize the 4 WD.
sentences.cn: 可以选装倒档同步器机构和分动器,使倒档无冲击和实现四轮驱动.

sentences.en: Synchronizer gear hub is made of PM, with more complex shapes and different thickness section.
sentences.cn: 同步器齿毂的材料为粉末冶金, 形状比较复杂,而且截面的厚度不一样.

sentences.en: The SPM - D 10 YB synchronizer provides automatic frequency and voltage matching using discrete output bias signals.
sentences.cn: 该扫描探针显微镜-d10yb同步器,提供自动频率和电压匹配使用离散输出偏置信号.

sentences.en: The Synchronizer allows you to synchronize folders, disks or computers.
sentences.cn: 同步器可让您同步文件夹, 磁盘或计算机上.

sentences.en: The Synchronizer is closing. Please wait while it finishes processing.
sentences.cn: 同步器即将关闭. 请等候进程结束.

sentences.en: This paper proposes the design of a symbol and earner synchronizer for Chinese DTTB system.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于中国数字电视国标系统接收机的低复杂度同步模块实现结构.

words.tran_cn: 不考虑历史上变化的；限于一时的；完全同步的
